From Arrogant Guy to Sexy Maid!.author: CorruptedHeroines
From Arrogant Guy to Sexy Maid!.summary:
Those reincarnation goddesses lied to me. I was supposed to get an easy life as King in another world, but…
Instead something completely different happened!... /> Now I have to clean and serve as a maid for the entire Order of female Knights? And they also have something else between their legs... and I have to clean that too!
+++
A new adventure in another world does not go at all like expected!
[TG, Gender Bender, Smut, Futanari]

The Sorceress and the Unicorn.author: Shannon Colby
The Sorceress and the Unicorn.summary:
Dennis is a research magician who wants nothing more than to live a solitary life in the Adamantine Palace among his books.  But when he discovers a unicorn egg, his life and his gender are turned upside down.

Now Denise, she moves to Briargate, an all-woman community where her unicorn can grow up safely.  But there are forces at work, both ancient and modern, that wish to destroy Briargate.  The solitary sorceress must learn that she might need more than magic to save her new town.

She'll need friends, too.

Second Pass.summary: Leo Evans, in his mid-30s at a dead end job as a paralegal finds himself wishing could change his circumstances. Upon the appearance of a strange trunk in his apartment, he finds himself able to do just that.

Magical Girl Exorcist Squad: One-Shot Is.summary: A series of standalone issues set between seasons of the main MGES saga to provide greater insight into the characters.

Popularity of the Unexpected kind.author: SexyBex1985
Popularity of the Unexpected kind.summary: Charlie Owens had recently graduated from high school whilst moving in with his older sister, who worked for a PR and Marketing agency having some of the world’s biggest names as clients. When a problem arises with his sister's job…will Charlie step up and help her…no matter what it takes? How far will he be willing to go?

Gym Bod (Short Story).author: Nothing To See Here
Gym Bod (Short Story).summary: Nikki hid in one of the lockers in the men's locker room at her local gym to record them changing, but when she left the locker, she gets caught and faces a fitting punishment

Girlhood.author: Amaty
Girlhood.summary: Tyler is the definition of a nuisance of a teen boy. When he gets expelled from school, his only option is to go to an girl's school. Surely, nothing will happen that changes how he sees himself. Right?

Beau and The Beast.author: danifish879
Beau and The Beast.summary: When bookish Beau's father discovers his child's big secret, Maurice seeks the enchanted castle to find a way to help them in this queer adaptation of Beauty and the Beast.

Devils in the Walls.author: PunchlinePress
Devils in the Walls.summary:
Set in the fictional Kyodai-toshi's 9th Ward, it follows the journey of Iwasaki Akito as he finds himself thrust into a world he never could have expected, facing down supernatural threats from beyond the veil between worlds. Serving as a love letter of sorts to all the TG anime and manga I've consumed over the years, mixed with a dark take on the sentai/magical girl genres, I hope you find it as enjoyable as I've found such media over the years.

CW for graphic depictions of violence, gore, and death.

Moonlit Waters.author: September
Moonlit Waters.summary:
"I'm just scared somehow that you're not even real."
"And what if I wasn't? What if I wasn't, but wanted to be?"

When Timothy Crow gets the ability to turn into a girl whenever he goes swimming, his first reaction is to panic, resulting in his near death by drowning. 
Of course, the one who shows up to save him is his best friend Alex. Alex, who Timothy has been trying to avoid meeting in person recently.
Timothy decides to use this second identity to rekindle the bond between him and his friend, but he seems to be missing something.
Why has his depression so suddenly vanished? 
Why does being a different person feel so much better?
What will happen when Alex takes an obvious liking to the mysterious girl he met at the lake, who doesn't seem to exist in the light of day?
In the hottest summer in decades, as a comet with allegedly magical properties circles Earth, a seemingly normal boy sets out on a journey toward self-discovery and love.

Cate Fox and the Case of the Fading Magi.author: tfes8
Cate Fox and the Case of the Fading Magi.summary:
Welcome to Puellae Aurora Academy! PAA is an exclusive high school for students who have recently undergone gender transformation - commonly referred to as having been TG’d. At Puellae Aurora, we will take great care of your daughter, son, or nonbinary teenager. In addition to our excellent academic track record, your teen will learn what it means to be a TG, and how to best adapt to a less-tolerant outside world. Our students are given space and freedom to become productive, capable, and sociable young adults. Professional and nurturing faculty members, many of them PAA alumni, are on hand to guide your teen…
 
Enter Jack Baker. Jack is a seasoned detective with expertise in finding missing persons. That is, until an encounter with a Body Hopper. Now, stuck in the body of a 14-year-old teenage girl, Jack is enlisted by Puellae Aurora Academy to go undercover as a student to solve their missing person cases before all of the magic is gone.

www.changeme.com.author: Connie Hollis
www.changeme.com.summary:
There’s a sound on the internet that hypnotizes the listener and changes them into a girl. There’s hundreds all over, but this one works, this one, is real.

Desmond is a miserable 14 year old guy. His only real friends are his brother, who’s a year older, and his cousin, who doesn’t even go to the same school. One day while going through the internet, he clicks on a link to a website, that plays a video that changes him to a girl.

Mirror Changed.author: Alyss_N_Onymous
Mirror Changed.summary:
Imagine if there were quasi-sentient fields of energy that gained their power from everything that they were attached to.  Or perhaps gave power to everything they had connection with.
   One the great field of Gaia.  Of all creatures that ever were and ever will be.

   The other that of the creations of Mankind.  The factors that make up all of Civilization.
   Because of the excesses of one and the hyper conservativeness of the other they find themselves at war.  Often to the point of Genocide.
   Into this world Jayde Lewis is thrust.  With no warning, no notice, and no handy guidebook to help him out.

Inherited Zeal.author: Tegeli
Inherited Zeal.summary:
Romantic planetary romance novella, set on a windswept frontier dotted with plague-infested ruins.

A self-exiled remittance man is forced from his stupor, when his regular allowance is forwarded further into the interior of an untamed continent. To escape his debtholders, he dons the guise of a woman, only to find the role more permanent than only the duration of a voyage across the steppe. In the faded sunlight, the shades of the past remain ahead.

Takes place on the same world as 'Fervour of the Past'.

Samuel Bennett has been in love with Amanda Brookfield ever since junior year of high school. Now they're freshmen at college and Amanda just broke up with her boyfriend of eight years. Now's the time to confess his love... now's the time to tell her how he really feels!

Seamless Unity.summary:
Harper is feeling that his life are going to waste while he spends all his time at his suburban home, reading. When he reached twenty, he got invited to enroll in a special secret society owned University, filled with the future leadership of humanity. But Harper got the pink envelope, not the blue one! 
He must enroll in the school as female, and while he is becoming a model student, he also learns his future place in society, and things are starting to get very real.

Nothing's Changed.author: SelkieTG
Nothing's Changed.summary: Just the start of a normal working day, as our male character waits for a bus, naked but for his usual collar and heels. Except, something about his small breasts, and plugging himself into his berth on the bus for his Kezini rider, seems confusing.

Wishing In West Texas.author: C C Mala
Wishing In West Texas.summary:
A hapless cowboy is coaxed into divulging his most secret desire to a seemingly innocent old lady. His wish is granted in the most unexpected way. A word of advice, never assume the person you are talking to is not a witch. Better safe than sorry!

This is the first of three chapters - so hold onto your hat and check back often for bi-weekly (twice-a-week) updates.

And don't forget to leave comments! The more feedback I get, the better the stories are that I write.

Purrfectly Me.author: Amaty
Purrfectly Me.summary: A young man gets a job at a cat cafe only to find out it has an event where all the staff have to crossdress after his first day working there. Follow Nate on their daily life as they slowly find out about themselves.

Photograph.author: totalgirliegirl
Photograph.summary:
A trans woman makes a wish to relive her childhood, but instead ends up in the childhood of her biological mother, a high school freshman in the fall of 1984.

Being raised by the wrong parents in the wrong state, with all the wrong hairstyles and technology, she is faced with a choice. Does she try to find a way out? Can she cope with never seeing her real family again? Or is this the childhood she always wanted?

All my Stars and Constellations.author: Korra Del Rio
All my Stars and Constellations.summary: The realms are in silent crises as the Imperials have laid waist to a kingdom of Taurus. For their sin of love shared between an Imperial Orion and a kingdomly Taurus son of the bull. They’ve crossed lines and now their love child will bare the fruit of change. As the Imperium comes of age old civilizations return to see what’s become of a cast off planet ruled now by stars of power from an  alternate dimension. Thrice forces mechanizing the fate of one strange child for to whom power overwhelming is assured.

Facility B.author: Aprille Blossom
Facility B.summary: In the not so distant future, a mysterious virus has arisen that prevents women from birthing female children. In a scramble to find a solution to this new global crisis, Facility B is established - a transitioning facility for young adults, chosen at random by the government. But is this Facility what it appears to be on the surface? Or is something far more mysterious happening here? Follow Kris as he is "selected" to attend this facility, and prepare yourself for a wild ride as he delves deep into the strange and mysterious complex. First story ever posted! Inspired by the works of many great authors on this site and elsewhere. I sincerely hope you enjoy!

As I have done in a previous story, there are links posted at the end of each chapter that will bring you to a YouTube version of the music mentioned. There’s only one link for this chapter, but there will be more as the story progresses. Please feel free to leave comments! 

A QUICK NOTE: This was a long and somewhat challenging story for me, AND it was written during the most busy, exhausting and frustrating six months of my life. I hope it appeals to you. If it doesn’t, that’s cool, too, but regardless, it was my link to sanity during a tough time.

Layla loves boys.author: trashlikeyou
Layla loves boys.summary: A young man moves to Western Europe from the U.S. with an all expenses paid scholarship. Cash in hand, he finds a cheap room in a midsize city and prepares to begin his studies. But the people he meets have their own stories. Maybe it’s for the best. Given a push, he sets off down a path that he was never meant to tread. What unforeseen pleasure awaits him at the hands of fate? It may be that destiny has placed them together. Some of us are explorers, but others need to be led.

Aprille's World.summary: Strange, magical lands? A town stuck in time? Welcome to Aprille's World, a collection of short  fantasy MTF stories brought to you by yours truly! This is a collection of  tales which are designed to take you on fun, new adventures. Each "chapter" will be it's own journey, so be sure to check back when there are updates! I hope you enjoy!

Teen Show - Faith & Gracie.author: myother123
Teen Show - Faith & Gracie.summary: After barging into his sister's room uninvited for the thousandth time, Finn causes Gracie to botch a magic spell that leaves them trapped in a sitcom universe as twins Faith and Gracie. While Gracie works to undo the spell and send them home, Finn is stuck playing her girly girl sister Faith.

New Filter (Short Story).summary:
There's a new app where you can edit your pictures how you want, and every filter looks very realistic, so realistic that you could edit a picture of yourself to look like the opposite sex and transform you into how the filter makes you look!
A young man named Daniel downloads the app and tries out the body mod filters, and enjoys the results
